00015   Expand::Expand(Context& ctx, Eval* eval, Contextualize_Eval* contextualize_eval, Env* env, Backtrace* bt)
00016   : ctx(ctx),
00017     eval(eval),
00018     contextualize_eval(contextualize_eval),
00019     env(env),
00020     block_stack(vector<Block*>()),
00021     property_stack(vector<String*>()),
00022     selector_stack(vector<Selector*>()),
00023     at_root_selector_stack(vector<Selector*>()),
00024     in_at_root(false),
00025     in_keyframes(false),
00026     backtrace(bt)
00027   { selector_stack.push_back(0); }

00029   Statement* Expand::operator()(Block* b)
00030   {
00031     Env new_env;
00032     new_env.link(*env);
00033     env = &new_env;
00034     Block* bb = new (ctx.mem) Block(b->pstate(), b->length(), b->is_root());
00035     block_stack.push_back(bb);
00036     append_block(b);
00037     block_stack.pop_back();
00038     env = env->parent();
00039     return bb;
00040   }

00042   Statement* Expand::operator()(Ruleset* r)
00043   {
00044     bool old_in_at_root = in_at_root;
00045     in_at_root = false;
00046 
00047     if (in_keyframes) {
00048       To_String to_string;
00049       Keyframe_Rule* k = new (ctx.mem) Keyframe_Rule(r->pstate(), r->block()->perform(this)->block());
00050       if (r->selector()) k->selector(r->selector()->perform(contextualize_eval->with(0, env, backtrace)));
00051       in_at_root = old_in_at_root;
00052       old_in_at_root = false;
00053       return k;
00054     }
00055 
00056     Contextualize_Eval* contextual = contextualize_eval->with(selector_stack.back(), env, backtrace);
00057     // if (old_in_at_root && !r->selector()->has_reference())
00058     //   contextual = contextualize_eval->with(selector_stack.back(), env, backtrace);
00059 
00060     Selector* sel_ctx = r->selector()->perform(contextual);
00061     if (sel_ctx == 0) throw "Cannot expand null selector";
00062 
00063     Emitter emitter(&ctx);
00064     Inspect isp(emitter);
00065     sel_ctx->perform(&isp);
00066     string str = isp.get_buffer();
00067     str += ";";
00068 
00069     Parser p(ctx, r->pstate());
00070     p.block_stack.push_back(r->selector() ? r->selector()->last_block() : 0);
00071     p.last_media_block = r->selector() ? r->selector()->media_block() : 0;
00072     p.source   = str.c_str();
00073     p.position = str.c_str();
00074     p.end      = str.c_str() + strlen(str.c_str());
00075     Selector_List* sel_lst = p.parse_selector_group();
00076     // sel_lst->pstate(isp.remap(sel_lst->pstate()));
00077 
00078     for(size_t i = 0; i < sel_lst->length(); i++) {
00079 
00080       Complex_Selector* pIter = (*sel_lst)[i];
00081       while (pIter) {
00082         Compound_Selector* pHead = pIter->head();
00083         // pIter->pstate(isp.remap(pIter->pstate()));
00084         if (pHead) {
00085           // pHead->pstate(isp.remap(pHead->pstate()));
00086           // (*pHead)[0]->pstate(isp.remap((*pHead)[0]->pstate()));
00087         }
00088         pIter = pIter->tail();
00089       }
00090     }
00091     sel_ctx = sel_lst;
00092 
00093     selector_stack.push_back(sel_ctx);
00094     Block* blk = r->block()->perform(this)->block();
00095     Ruleset* rr = new (ctx.mem) Ruleset(r->pstate(),
00096                                         sel_ctx,
00097                                         blk);
00098     rr->tabs(r->tabs());
00099     selector_stack.pop_back();
00100     in_at_root = old_in_at_root;
00101     old_in_at_root = false;
00102     return rr;
00103   }

00105   Statement* Expand::operator()(Propset* p)
00106   {
00107     property_stack.push_back(p->property_fragment());
00108     Block* expanded_block = p->block()->perform(this)->block();
00109 
00110     Block* current_block = block_stack.back();
00111     for (size_t i = 0, L = expanded_block->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00112       Statement* stm = (*expanded_block)[i];
00113       if (typeid(*stm) == typeid(Declaration)) {
00114         Declaration* dec = static_cast<Declaration*>(stm);
00115         String_Schema* combined_prop = new (ctx.mem) String_Schema(p->pstate());
00116         if (!property_stack.empty()) {
00117           *combined_prop << property_stack.back()
00118                          << new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(p->pstate(), "-")
00119                          << dec->property(); // TODO: eval the prop into a string constant
00120         }
00121         else {
00122           *combined_prop << dec->property();
00123         }
00124         dec->property(combined_prop);
00125         *current_block << dec;
00126       }
00127       else if (typeid(*stm) == typeid(Comment)) {
00128         // drop comments in propsets
00129       }
00130       else {
00131         error("contents of namespaced properties must result in style declarations only", stm->pstate(), backtrace);
00132       }
00133     }
00134 
00135     property_stack.pop_back();
00136 
00137     return 0;
00138   }

00140   Statement* Expand::operator()(Feature_Block* f)

00144                                                     static_cast<Feature_Query*>(feature_queries),
00145                                                     f->block()->perform(this)->block());

00150   Statement* Expand::operator()(Media_Block* m)
00151   {
00152     To_String to_string(&ctx);
00153     Expression* mq = m->media_queries()->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace));
00154     mq = Parser::from_c_str(mq->perform(&to_string).c_str(), ctx, mq->pstate()).parse_media_queries();
00155     Media_Block* mm = new (ctx.mem) Media_Block(m->pstate(),
00156                                                 static_cast<List*>(mq),
00157                                                 m->block()->perform(this)->block(),

00163   Statement* Expand::operator()(At_Root_Block* a)
00164   {
00165     in_at_root = true;
00166     at_root_selector_stack.push_back(0);
00167     Block* ab = a->block();
00168     Expression* ae = a->expression();
00169     if (ae) ae = ae->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace));
00170     else ae = new (ctx.mem) At_Root_Expression(a->pstate());
00171     Block* bb = ab ? ab->perform(this)->block() : 0;
00172     At_Root_Block* aa = new (ctx.mem) At_Root_Block(a->pstate(),
00173                                                     bb,
00174                                                     static_cast<At_Root_Expression*>(ae));
00175     at_root_selector_stack.pop_back();
00176     in_at_root = false;
00177     return aa;
00178   }

00180   Statement* Expand::operator()(At_Rule* a)
00181   {
00182     bool old_in_keyframes = in_keyframes;
00183     in_keyframes = a->is_keyframes();
00184     Block* ab = a->block();
00185     Selector* as = a->selector();
00186     Expression* av = a->value();
00187     if (as) as = as->perform(contextualize_eval->with(0, env, backtrace));
00188     else if (av) av = av->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace));
00189     Block* bb = ab ? ab->perform(this)->block() : 0;
00190     At_Rule* aa = new (ctx.mem) At_Rule(a->pstate(),
00191                                         a->keyword(),
00192                                         as,
00193                                         bb);
00194     if (av) aa->value(av);
00195     in_keyframes = old_in_keyframes;
00196     return aa;
00197   }

00199   Statement* Expand::operator()(Declaration* d)
00200   {
00201     String* old_p = d->property();
00202     String* new_p = static_cast<String*>(old_p->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace)));
00203     Selector* p = selector_stack.size() <= 1 ? 0 : selector_stack.back();
00204     Expression* value = d->value()->perform(eval->with(p, env, backtrace));
00205     if (value->is_invisible() && !d->is_important()) return 0;
00206     Declaration* decl = new (ctx.mem) Declaration(d->pstate(),
00207                                                   new_p,
00208                                                   value,
00209                                                   d->is_important());
00210     decl->tabs(d->tabs());
00211     return decl;
00212   }

00214   Statement* Expand::operator()(Assignment* a)
00215   {
00216     string var(a->variable());
00217     Selector* p = selector_stack.size() <= 1 ? 0 : selector_stack.back();
00218     if (a->is_global()) {
00219       if (a->is_default()) {
00220         if (env->has_global(var)) {
00221           Expression* e = dynamic_cast<Expression*>(env->get_global(var));
00222           if (!e || e->concrete_type() == Expression::NULL_VAL) {
00223             env->set_global(var, a->value()->perform(eval->with(p, env, backtrace)));
00224           }
00225         }
00226         else {
00227           env->set_global(var, a->value()->perform(eval->with(p, env, backtrace)));
00228         }
00229       }
00230       else {
00231         env->set_global(var, a->value()->perform(eval->with(p, env, backtrace)));
00232       }
00233     }
00234     else if (a->is_default()) {
00235       if (env->has_lexical(var)) {
00236         auto cur = env;
00237         while (cur && cur->is_lexical()) {
00238           if (cur->has_local(var)) {
00239             if (AST_Node* node = cur->get_local(var)) {
00240               Expression* e = dynamic_cast<Expression*>(node);
00241               if (!e || e->concrete_type() == Expression::NULL_VAL) {
00242                 cur->set_local(var, a->value()->perform(eval->with(p, env, backtrace)));
00243               }
00244             }
00245             else {
00246               throw runtime_error("Env not in sync");
00247             }
00248             return 0;
00249           }
00250           cur = cur->parent();
00251         }
00252         throw runtime_error("Env not in sync");
00253       }
00254       else if (env->has_global(var)) {
00255         if (AST_Node* node = env->get_global(var)) {
00256           Expression* e = dynamic_cast<Expression*>(node);
00257           if (!e || e->concrete_type() == Expression::NULL_VAL) {
00258             env->set_global(var, a->value()->perform(eval->with(p, env, backtrace)));
00259           }
00260         }
00261       }
00262       else if (env->is_lexical()) {
00263         env->set_local(var, a->value()->perform(eval->with(p, env, backtrace)));
00264       }
00265       else {
00266         env->set_local(var, a->value()->perform(eval->with(p, env, backtrace)));
00267       }
00268     }
00269     else {
00270       env->set_lexical(var, a->value()->perform(eval->with(p, env, backtrace)));
00271     }
00272     return 0;
00273   }

00276   {
00277     Import* result = new (ctx.mem) Import(imp->pstate());
00278     for ( size_t i = 0, S = imp->urls().size(); i < S; ++i) {
00279       result->urls().push_back(imp->urls()[i]->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace)));
00280     }
00281     return result;
00282   }

00317   Statement* Expand::operator()(If* i)
00318   {
00319     if (*i->predicate()->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace))) {
00320       append_block(i->consequent());
00321     }
00322     else {
00323       Block* alt = i->alternative();
00324       if (alt) append_block(alt);
00325     }
00326     return 0;
00327   }

00329   // For does not create a new env scope
00330   // But iteration vars are reset afterwards
00331   Statement* Expand::operator()(For* f)
00332   {
00333     string variable(f->variable());
00334     Expression* low = f->lower_bound()->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace));
00335     if (low->concrete_type() != Expression::NUMBER) {
00336       error("lower bound of `@for` directive must be numeric", low->pstate(), backtrace);
00337     }
00338     Expression* high = f->upper_bound()->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace));
00339     if (high->concrete_type() != Expression::NUMBER) {
00340       error("upper bound of `@for` directive must be numeric", high->pstate(), backtrace);
00341     }
00342     Number* sass_start = static_cast<Number*>(low);
00343     Number* sass_end = static_cast<Number*>(high);
00344     // check if units are valid for sequence
00345     if (sass_start->unit() != sass_end->unit()) {
00346       stringstream msg; msg << "Incompatible units: '"
00347         << sass_start->unit() << "' and '"
00348         << sass_end->unit() << "'.";
00349       error(msg.str(), low->pstate(), backtrace);
00350     }
00351     double start = sass_start->value();
00352     double end = sass_end->value();
00353     // only create iterator once in this environment
00354     Number* it = new (env->mem) Number(low->pstate(), start, sass_end->unit());
00355     AST_Node* old_var = env->has_local(variable) ? env->get_local(variable) : 0;
00356     env->set_local(variable, it);
00357     Block* body = f->block();
00358     if (start < end) {
00359       if (f->is_inclusive()) ++end;
00360       for (double i = start;
00361            i < end;
00362            ++i) {
00363         it->value(i);
00364         env->set_local(variable, it);
00365         append_block(body);
00366       }
00367     } else {
00368       if (f->is_inclusive()) --end;
00369       for (double i = start;
00370            i > end;
00371            --i) {
00372         it->value(i);
00373         env->set_local(variable, it);
00374         append_block(body);
00375       }
00376     }
00377     // restore original environment
00378     if (!old_var) env->del_local(variable);
00379     else env->set_local(variable, old_var);
00380     return 0;
00381   }
00382 
00383   // Eval does not create a new env scope
00384   // But iteration vars are reset afterwards
00385   Statement* Expand::operator()(Each* e)
00386   {
00387     vector<string> variables(e->variables());
00388     Expression* expr = e->list()->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace));
00389     List* list = 0;
00390     Map* map = 0;
00391     if (expr->concrete_type() == Expression::MAP) {
00392       map = static_cast<Map*>(expr);
00393     }
00394     else if (expr->concrete_type() != Expression::LIST) {
00395       list = new (ctx.mem) List(expr->pstate(), 1, List::COMMA);
00396       *list << expr;
00397     }
00398     else {
00399       list = static_cast<List*>(expr);
00400     }
00401     // remember variables and then reset them
00402     vector<AST_Node*> old_vars(variables.size());
00403     for (size_t i = 0, L = variables.size(); i < L; ++i) {
00404       old_vars[i] = env->has_local(variables[i]) ? env->get_local(variables[i]) : 0;
00405       env->set_local(variables[i], 0);
00406     }
00407     Block* body = e->block();
00408 
00409     if (map) {
00410       for (auto key : map->keys()) {
00411         Expression* k = key->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace));
00412         Expression* v = map->at(key)->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace));
00413 
00414         if (variables.size() == 1) {
00415           List* variable = new (ctx.mem) List(map->pstate(), 2, List::SPACE);
00416           *variable << k;
00417           *variable << v;
00418           env->set_local(variables[0], variable);
00419         } else {
00420           env->set_local(variables[0], k);
00421           env->set_local(variables[1], v);
00422         }
00423         append_block(body);
00424       }
00425     }
00426     else {
00427       for (size_t i = 0, L = list->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00428         List* variable = 0;
00429         if ((*list)[i]->concrete_type() != Expression::LIST  || variables.size() == 1) {
00430           variable = new (ctx.mem) List((*list)[i]->pstate(), 1, List::COMMA);
00431           *variable << (*list)[i];
00432         }
00433         else {
00434           variable = static_cast<List*>((*list)[i]);
00435         }
00436         for (size_t j = 0, K = variables.size(); j < K; ++j) {
00437           if (j < variable->length()) {
00438             env->set_local(variables[j], (*variable)[j]->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace)));
00439           }
00440           else {
00441             env->set_local(variables[j], new (ctx.mem) Null(expr->pstate()));
00442           }
00443         }
00444         append_block(body);
00445       }
00446     }
00447     // restore original environment
00448     for (size_t j = 0, K = variables.size(); j < K; ++j) {
00449       if(!old_vars[j]) env->del_local(variables[j]);
00450       else env->set_local(variables[j], old_vars[j]);
00451     }
00452     return 0;
00453   }

00455   Statement* Expand::operator()(While* w)
00456   {
00457     Expression* pred = w->predicate();
00458     Block* body = w->block();
00459     while (*pred->perform(eval->with(env, backtrace))) {
00460       append_block(body);
00461     }
00462     return 0;
00463   }

00471   Statement* Expand::operator()(Extension* e)
00472   {
00473     To_String to_string(&ctx);
00474     Selector_List* extender = static_cast<Selector_List*>(selector_stack.back());
00475     if (!extender) return 0;
00476     Contextualize_Eval* eval = contextualize_eval->with(0, env, backtrace);
00477     Selector_List* selector_list = static_cast<Selector_List*>(e->selector());
00478     Selector_List* contextualized = static_cast<Selector_List*>(selector_list->perform(eval));
00479     // ToDo: remove once feature proves stable!
00480     // if (contextualized->length() != 1) {
00481     //   error("selector groups may not be extended", extendee->pstate(), backtrace);
00482     // }
00483     for (auto complex_sel : contextualized->elements()) {
00484       Complex_Selector* c = complex_sel;
00485       if (!c->head() || c->tail()) {
00486         error("nested selectors may not be extended", c->pstate(), backtrace);
00487       }
00488       Compound_Selector* compound_sel = c->head();
00489       compound_sel->is_optional(selector_list->is_optional());
00490       // // need to convert the compound selector into a by-value data structure
00491       // vector<string> target_vec;
00492       // for (size_t i = 0, L = compound_sel->length(); i < L; ++i)
00493       // { target_vec.push_back((*compound_sel)[i]->perform(&to_string)); }
00494       for (size_t i = 0, L = extender->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00495         // let's test this out
00496         // cerr << "REGISTERING EXTENSION REQUEST: " << (*extender)[i]->perform(&to_string) << " <- " << compound_sel->perform(&to_string) << endl;
00497         ctx.subset_map.put(compound_sel->to_str_vec(), make_pair((*extender)[i], compound_sel));
00498       }
00499     }
00500     return 0;
00501   }

00503   Statement* Expand::operator()(Definition* d)
00504   {
00505     Definition* dd = new (ctx.mem) Definition(*d);
00506     env->local_frame()[d->name() +
00507                         (d->type() == Definition::MIXIN ? "[m]" : "[f]")] = dd;
00508     // set the static link so we can have lexical scoping
00509     dd->environment(env);
00510     return 0;
00511   }
00512 
00513   Statement* Expand::operator()(Mixin_Call* c)
00514   {
00515     string full_name(c->name() + "[m]");
00516     if (!env->has(full_name)) {
00517       error("no mixin named " + c->name(), c->pstate(), backtrace);
00518     }
00519     Definition* def = static_cast<Definition*>((*env)[full_name]);
00520     Block* body = def->block();
00521     Parameters* params = def->parameters();
00522     Selector* p = selector_stack.size() <= 1 ? 0 : selector_stack.back();
00523 
00524     Arguments* args = static_cast<Arguments*>(c->arguments()
00525                                                ->perform(eval->with(p, env, backtrace)));
00526     Backtrace here(backtrace, c->pstate(), ", in mixin `" + c->name() + "`");
00527     backtrace = &here;
00528     Env new_env;
00529     new_env.link(def->environment());
00530     if (c->block()) {
00531       // represent mixin content blocks as thunks/closures
00532       Definition* thunk = new (ctx.mem) Definition(c->pstate(),
00533                                                    "@content",
00534                                                    new (ctx.mem) Parameters(c->pstate()),
00535                                                    c->block(),
00536                                                    &ctx,
00537                                                    Definition::MIXIN);
00538       thunk->environment(env);
00539       new_env.local_frame()["@content[m]"] = thunk;
00540     }
00541     bind("mixin " + c->name(), params, args, ctx, &new_env, eval);
00542     Env* old_env = env;
00543     env = &new_env;
00544     append_block(body);
00545     env = old_env;
00546     backtrace = here.parent;
00547     return 0;
00548   }
00549 
00550   Statement* Expand::operator()(Content* c)
00551   {
00552     // convert @content directives into mixin calls to the underlying thunk
00553     if (!env->has("@content[m]")) return 0;
00554     Mixin_Call* call = new (ctx.mem) Mixin_Call(c->pstate(),
00555                                                 "@content",
00556                                                 new (ctx.mem) Arguments(c->pstate()));
00557     return call->perform(this);
00558   }

00560   inline Statement* Expand::fallback_impl(AST_Node* n)
00561   {
00562     error("unknown internal error; please contact the LibSass maintainers", n->pstate(), backtrace);
00563     String_Constant* msg = new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(ParserState("[WARN]"), string("`Expand` doesn't handle ") + typeid(*n).name());
00564     return new (ctx.mem) Warning(ParserState("[WARN]"), msg);
00565   }
00566 
00567   inline void Expand::append_block(Block* b)
00568   {
00569     Block* current_block = block_stack.back();
00570     for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00571       Statement* ith = (*b)[i]->perform(this);
00572       if (ith) *current_block << ith;
00573     }
00574   }
00575 }
